value.excerpt: A really fun series of professional StarCraft 2 between PartinG and Cure. value.title: StarCraft 2: THE QUEEN PUSH! (Reynor vs Dream)

Dream decides to focus his attention on Hellbat pushes and Battlecruisers, Reynor goes for Roaches, Ravagers and the Queen march.  Get more videos

value.title: StarCraft 2: WHAT YEAR IS IT?! (DRG vs SpeCial)
value.excerpt: Muta Ling Bane was a popular style in the early days of StarCraft 2. Yet over the year the style kind of fell off.
